member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.Android.OpeningEventArgs
member.summary: Occurs when the first level menu that starts to expanding to open.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.Android.OpenedEventArgs
member.summary: Occurs when the first level menu get expanded to opened.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.Android.ClosingEventArgs
member.summary: Occurs when the first level menu that starts to collapsing to close.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.Android.ClosedEventArgs
member.summary: Occurs when the first level menu get collapsed to Closed.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.Android.NavigatingEventArgs
member.summary: Occurs when a Radial Menu item tapped to starts navigating to its next hierarchy level or Center back button is tapped to starts navigating to previous hierarchy level. Its occurs only an item that has children

member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.Android.NavigatedEventArgs
member.summary: Occurs when a Radial Menu item tapped and navigated to its next hierarchy level or Center back button is tapped to navigated to its previous hierarchy level. Its occurs only an item that has children

member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.Android.RadialMenuItemTappedEventArgs
member.summary: Occurs when a RadialMenuItem get Tapped. Item can be retrieve and customized

members.member: Gets / Sets the font icon text for center button
Gets / Sets thickness of the separator

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.Android.SfRadialMenu.CenterButtonView
member.summary: Gets or sets the value indicating view of the center button at first level. Any view can be assigned as center button view.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.Android.SfRadialMenu.Items
member.summary: Gets or sets the items.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.Android.SfRadialMenu.ItemsSource
member.summary: Gets or sets a collection of items that can be populated as SfRadialMenuItem and get rendered at run-time based on the Template provided.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.Android.SfRadialMenu.Point
member.summary: Gets or sets the value indication the position of the center button placement. User can determine the position of the center button while loading.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.Android.SfRadialMenu.IsOpen
member.summary: Gets or sets the value indicating either the control has to be open or closed. Using this property user can load the control with open state.
member.value: true if is open; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.Android.SfRadialMenu.EnableRotation
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that enable or disable the rim rotation with touch gestures.
member.value: true if enable rotation; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.Android.SfRadialMenu.IsDragEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets the value indicating whether the center button can be drag on the view. It is applicable when the SfRadialMenu in closed state.
member.value: true if is drag enabled; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.Android.SfRadialMenu.EnableCenterButtonAnimation
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that enable and disable Zoom In or Zoom out animation when the RadialMenu getting open or close respectively.
member.value: true if enable center button animation; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.Android.SfRadialMenu.VisibleSegmentsCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that splits the available spaces as pie segments. Exceeded items will not shown and beneath items leave empty space on rim. It will be applicable only if the SfRadialMenu in Custom layout type.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.Android.SfRadialMenu.AnimationDuration
member.summary: Gets or sets the value indicating the speed of opening / closing / navigating animations.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.Android.SfRadialMenu.CenterButtonRadius
member.summary: Get or set the value that indicating the size of the center button at first level by adjusting its radius.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.Android.SfRadialMenu.CenterButtonText
member.summary: Get or set the value indicating text of the center button at first level and it can also act as font icon. It will not applicable to custom view assigned through CenterButtonView.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.Android.SfRadialMenu.CenterButtonTextSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicating the size of the text / icon of the center button at first level. It will not applicable to custom view assigned through CenterButtonView
member.value: The size of the center button text.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.Android.SfRadialMenu.CenterButtonBackText
member.summary: Get or set the value indicating text of the center button when it navigated to next level and not in first level and it can also act as font icon. It will not applicable to custom view assigned through CenterBackButtonView.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.Android.SfRadialMenu.CenterButtonBackTypeface
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicating the font family of the text of center button when it navigated to next level and not in first level. Font icon support will achieved through this support. It will not applicable to custom view assigned through CenterBackButtonView

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.Android.SfRadialMenu.CenterButtonBackTextSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicating the size of the text / icon of the center button when it navigated to next level and not in first level. It will not applicable to custom view assigned through CenterBackButtonView.
member.value: The size of the center button back text.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.Android.SfRadialMenu.CenterButtonBackTextColor
member.summary: Get or set the value indicating text/font icon color of the center button when it navigated to next level and not in first level. It will not applicable to custom view assigned through CenterBackButtonView.
member.value: The color of the center button back text.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.Android.SfRadialMenu.CenterButtonTypeface
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicating the font family of the text of center button when it navigated to next level and not in first level. Font icon support will achieved through this support. It will not applicable to custom view assigned through CenterBackButtonView.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.Android.SfRadialMenu.CenterButtonBorderThickness
member.summary: Gets or sets the value indicating the border thickness of the center button.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.Android.SfRadialMenu.OuterRimThickness
member.summary: Gets or sets the outer rim thickness.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.Android.SfRadialMenu.RimRadius
member.summary: Gets or sets the value indicating the size of the rim by adjusting its radius.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.Android.SfRadialMenu.RimColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the value indicating the color of the entire rim.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.Android.SfRadialMenu.CenterButtonTextColor
member.summary: Get or set the value indicating text/font icon color of the center button at first level. It will not applicable to custom view assigned through CenterButtonView.
member.value: The color of the center button text.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.Android.SfRadialMenu.CenterButtonBorderColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the value indicating the border color of the center button.
member.value: The color of the center button border.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.Android.SfRadialMenu.RimActiveColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the rim active.
member.value: The color of the rim active.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.Android.SfRadialMenu.OuterRimColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the outer rim.
member.value: The color of the outer rim.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.Android.SfRadialMenu.CenterButtonBackIcon
member.summary: Gets or sets the center button back icon.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.Android.SfRadialMenu.SeparatorColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the value indicating the color of the separator that appear between two items.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.Android.SfRadialMenu.SelectionColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the value indicating the back color of each items. Generally its represent as pie. It will not applicable to custom view.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.Android.SfRadialMenu.CenterButtonBackground
member.summary: Gets or sets the value indicating the back color of the center button at first level. It will not applicable to custom view assigned through CenterButtonView.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.Android.SfRadialMenu.SeparatorThickness
member.summary: Gets or sets the value indicating the thickness of the separator that appear between two items.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.Android.SfRadialMenu.LayoutType
member.summary: Gets or sets the value indicating arrangement of items on rim either automatic or user defined.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.Android.SfRadialMenu.Show
member.summary: Opens the first level items of the Radial Menu by expanding the rim.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.Android.SfRadialMenu.Close
member.summary: Closed the items of the Radial Menu by collapsing the rim.

members.member: Gets / sets image name available in resources
Gets / sets Text that can be displayed below the icon
Gets / sets font icon Text that can be displayed as the icon
Gets / sets custom View that can be displayed
Gets / sets color of the bottom text
Gets / sets color of the item background
Gets / sets color of the font icon
Gets / sets height of the item
Gets / sets width of the item
Gets / sets size of the bottom text
Gets / sets size of the font icon
Gets / sets typeface of the font icon
Gets / sets type face of the bottom text
Gets / sets subitems for every radialmenu item
Enables the position of the childrens

member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.Android.LayoutType
member.summary: Contains values of LayoutType that determines arrangement of items on rim either automatic or user defined

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.Android.LayoutType.Default
member.summary: Available items can populated on the rim by sharing the available space in equal ratio. Order of the item based on order of items in the assigned source

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.Android.LayoutType.Custom
member.summary: User can split the available spaces using VisibleSegmentCount as segments. Exceeded items will not shown and beneath items leave empty space on rim. User can rearrange or position the items using SegmentIndex property of SfRadialMenuItem
